trans-unit.source: Indicates that the capitalization style is all caps; all lowercase letters are replaced with uppercase letters.
trans-unit.target: 表示大小寫樣式為全部大寫，所有小寫字母都會由大寫字母取代。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the capitalization style is all petite caps; uppercase and lowercase letters are replaced with uppercase letters slightly smaller than small caps.
trans-unit.target: 表示大小寫樣式為全部 Petite 大寫字，大寫字母和小寫字母會由稍微小於小型大寫字的大寫字母取代。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that there is no capitalization style; uppercase and lowercase letters render normally.
trans-unit.target: 表示沒有大小寫樣式，大寫字母和小寫字母是以一般方式呈現。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the capitalization style is a style not explicitly specified in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Text.CapStyle" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 表示大小寫樣式為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Text.CapStyle" /> 列舉中未明確指定的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the capitalization style is petite caps; lowercase letters are replaced with uppercase letters slightly smaller than small caps.
trans-unit.target: 表示大小寫樣式為 Petite 大寫字，小寫字母會由稍微小於小型大寫字的大寫字母取代。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the capitalization style is small caps; lowercase letters are replaced with uppercase letters of the same approximate height as the font's x-height.
trans-unit.target: 表示大小寫樣式為小型大寫字，小寫字母會由與字型 x 高度大約相同高度之大寫字母取代。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the capitalization style is title case; uppercase and lowercase letters are rendered with letters specifically designed for titles.
trans-unit.target: 表示大小寫樣式為標題大寫，大寫字母和小寫字母是以專門為標題設計的字母來呈現。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the capitalization style is unicase; uppercase and lowercase letters are rendered in a way determined by the type designer.
trans-unit.target: 表示大小寫樣式為 Unicase，大寫字母和小寫字母的呈現方式是由型別設計工具決定。

trans-unit.source: A unicase alphabet is one that does not specify case for its letters.
trans-unit.target: Unicase 字母不會指定字母的大小寫。
